title: Appellant enforcement notice specific submission properties
description: Schema defining properties specific to enforcement notice appeals

applicationMadeAndFeePaid.description: Whether a planning application was made - historic question

retrospectiveApplication.description: Whether a retrospective planning application was made

groundAFeePaid.description: Whether a ground (a) fee has been paid

applicationDevelopmentAllOrPart.description: Did the application relate to all or part of the development

originalDevelopmentDescription.description: A description of the proposed development

changedDevelopmentDescription.description: An updated description of the proposed development

applicationReference.description: The unique identifier of the LPA application

applicationDate.description: The date of the original LPA application

applicationDecision.description: The outcome of the original LPA decision

applicationDecisionDate.description: The date of the original LPA decision

applicationDecisionAppealed.description: Whether an appeal was made against the original LPA decision

appealDecisionDate.description: The date of the appeal against the original LPA decision

planningObligation.description: Indicates the existence of a planning obligation

statusPlanningObligation.description: The planning obligation information, if available

writtenOrVerbalPermission.description: If required, whether the individual has permission to use the appeal land

interestInLand.description: Individual's interest in the appeal land

writtenOrVerbalPermission.description: If required, whether the individual has permission to use the appeal land

namedIndividuals.description: A list of individuals named on the enforcement notice

appealGrounds.description: A list of appeal grounds being pleaded
